content.question: The function of the second sentence of paragraph 3 (“Yet despite . . . abstractions”) is to

choices.label: explain how important it is not to make abstract judgments
point out a discrepancy between teaching practices and literary theory
highlight the demand for a way to measure emotional responses to texts
explore the author’s views about reading in isolation

content.answer: point out a discrepancy between teaching practices and literary theory
